about_the_game:
The AploVVare Collection is a collection of small games from the creator of Roseblight, Project Malice, & more! Most games were created for and submitted to game jams, originally created in under 72 hours. Some games are short-term projects, created just for the hell of it. Most have been updated from the original versions to include more content for this collection.



Games Included:
  • Terato Tamer - A turn-based strategy game where you seduce monsters to survive
  • Citri Plays Noirwood - A game where you play as a vtuber playing a horror game
  • Reversary - A reverse boss battle game where you are the big guy with a big sword
  • Hellfire Pizza - A game where you deliver pizza... in HELL
  • WELD - An atmospheric game where you fuse weapons to survive the wilderness
  • ...and more!

highlighted.name: Let’s Get The Hell Outta Here

content_descriptors.notes:
Most of the games featured in the collection contain mature content, and may not be suited for younger audiences. There are disclaimers at the beginning of each game that have such content so the player knows what they are getting into. This generally includes:

-Blood and Violence
-Profanity
-Sexual/Suggestive Content
-Sensitive/Political Topics

detailed_description:
The AploVVare Collection is a collection of small games from the creator of Roseblight, Project Malice, & more! Most games were created for and submitted to game jams, originally created in under 72 hours. Some games are short-term projects, created just for the hell of it. Most have been updated from the original versions to include more content for this collection.

name: AploVVare Collection

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: doesn't really matter
  • Additional Notes: if you have a computer that isn't 10 years old you'll be fine
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: AplovOS 98
  • Processor: AploVVare Supercore 8(TM)
  • Memory: 9 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Aplovidia RTX
  • Storage: 999 MB available space
  • Sound Card: aplove's beautiful singing voice
  • Additional Notes: aplove is not real. do not believe their lies.

short_description: You found an old game console along with some games at a garage sale. You remember playing these as a kid, and couldn't resist getting it. Maybe you could give them a whirl, just for old time's sake?
